product information:
The ViewSonic VX900 is a LCD monitor with SuperClear screen technology that provides amazing clarity and better viewing angles. The display screen of this ViewSonic 19-inch monitor has a resolution of 1,280 x 1,024 pixels that gives you crisp and sharp display. The onscreen controls of this ViewSonic LCD monitor effortlessly adjust a variety of picture settings for better viewing experience. With a brightness of 250 cd/m2, the ViewSonic VX900 allows you to view all the images and contents clearly. You get detailed picture with deep blacks and light whites due to the contrast ratio of 600:1 of this ViewSonic 19-inch monitor. The horizontal and vertical angles of up to 170 degrees of this ViewSonic LCD monitor gives you a perfect view from any corner of your room.
